CustomField.description: Reward type: "Fixed Value" (e.g. fixed number of Points) or "Specified by Field" (e.g. Dynamic field in which Points are given according to the chosen field)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose a Reward type: "Fixed Value" (e.g. fixed number of Points) or "Specified by Field" (e.g. Dynamic field in which Points are given according to the chosen field).
CustomField.label: Reward mode
